content: --इंद्रः {1} a king; <ls>R. 2. 18</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 33</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 80</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 253.</ls> {2} a physician, dealer in antidotes, curer of poisons; तेषु कश्चिन्नरेंद्राभिमानी तां निर्वर्ण्य <ls>Dk. 51</ls>; सुनिग्रहा नरेंद्रेण फणींद्रा इव शत्रवः <ls>Śi. 2. 88</ls> (where the word is used in both senses).
